author: Simon Difford
description: Tequila dominates this lightly citrusy fairly dry classic. The bitters play a key role in both balance and flavour.It's worth noting that this drink is a sour served in a highball glass but it is not a Highball and should not be topped with soda. A highball glass should be a max capacity of 10oz / 296ml. Use such a glass filled with ice and this recipe will fill to a good washline without need, or room, for a soda top.
name: Mexican Firing Squad Special

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
